talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html></html>

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
Something doesn't feel right. Compared to the Dark Elf's notoriety, this feels like it was...almost too easy. Perhaps they were just trying to cause confusion.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
My cool, careful planning has proven effective against Elena so far. Regardless, we must tread carefully when dealing with this Poison Spider.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
The Poison Spiders slowly turned poisonous due to the poison cloud that at the Forest of Death. Rumour has it that over-exposure to the poison does not kill you, but turns you into a monster instead.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
My years of knowledge is still not enough to form a solid conclusion. I'll need other people's advice to verify my theories.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
Therefore, I want you to ask the silver-haired swordswoman to confirm my theories. As soon as she does, you can wipe those spiders out!

$Argenta$
When will the airship to Saint Haven be fixed? Here I am, slowly recovering from my injuries alone. At least have some courtesy to get me a fried harpy or something!

$Argenta$
Poison Spiders?
It's very likely of Elena to have chosen poison to irritate us.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You've been bitten by a Poison Spider?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
I have been bitten by a Poison Spider in the past. It turned out to be a really itchy and annoying experience. So one day, when I had enough, I went to hunt that spider down and kicked it's sorry behind.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Uhh, right. So, where do the spiders come from?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Yes, what about you? I heard that humans die from the little bites. Haha, funny isn't it?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>To the <FONT color=#a82424>Dark Tower Magic Institute</FONT>! Let's go!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
They're found in the Forest of Death. The Spider Queen Raren, however, lives in the Dark Tower Magic Institute. Elena is doing something with those spiders...I just know it.

$Argenta$
Hey, are you leaving? I was bored, I thought you could stay and entertain me. Fine! GO!
Hmph! I hope the Spider Queen bites you heartily.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
I have heard that Argenta is quite an intelligent woman, just like me. Ask her for advice, and if my assumptions are confirmed, you can defeat the Poison Spiders!

$Argenta$
If I wasn't injured, I would go straight down to Dark Tower Magic Institute and beat Elena to a pulp! Ugh, I'm so bored...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The spiders seem to be collecting poison.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
So the Dark Tower Magic Institute was really the main base of the Poison Spiders? I knew it. What have you discovered there?
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
They are obviously gathering the poison to use as a weapon. The scale of this seems too big for you to handle by yourself. I will rally the other guild members to deal with this.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
We will move out the moment I get my reports.

$Argenta$
I have no clue as to why the spiders are gathering the poison. You'll have to figure it out. Report your findings to the Adventurer's Guild.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
We haven't found out where the poison is being stored at yet, but it's only a matter of time.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
They are obviously gathering the poison to use as a weapon. The scale of this seems too big for you to handle by yourself. I will rally the other guild members to deal with this.

qstep_change.comment: 엘레나의 지령서(300051)를 통해 독이 옮겨지는 정황을 파악한다.

journal.title: Movement of the Poison Spiders
journal.contents:
Defeat the Poison Spiders who have adapted to the poison cloud. Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard has no idea where they're coming from.

Calderock Village → Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.destination: Talk to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard.

journal.title: Ask Argenta for information on the Poison Spiders
journal.contents:
You need more information on the Poison Spiders. Speak with Argenta.

Gray Ruins → Argenta
journal.destination: Ask Argenta for information on the Poison Spiders
journal.todo_msg: Ask Argenta for information on the Poison Spiders

journal.title: Defeat Poison Spiders in the Dark Tower Magic Institute
journal.contents:
Argenta thinks that the Poison Spiders in Dark Tower Magic Institute are planning something. Find out if Spider Queen Rarenand Elena are working together.

Blizzard Plain (Secret Path) → Dark Tower Magic Institute
journal.destination: Defeat Poison Spiders in the Dark Tower Magic Institute
journal.todo_msg: Defeat the Poison Spiders in the Dark Tower Magic Institute.

journal.title: Report to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.contents:
You have defeated Spider Queen Raren. However, you have not yet found the place where the poison is being stored. Report back to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard.

Calderock Village → Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.destination: Report to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.todo_msg: A clue was obtained. Report back to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard.
